overview: Phil Butler, senior partner at Pamil Visions PR, an independent public relations company based in Germany, has worked in public relations, corporate communications and public administration for more than 15 years. Prior to that Phil was an engineer for several Fortune 500 companies, including Nucor Steel, Goodyear and Tenneco. Since 2006 he has been a web author for A-tier publications like ReadWriteWeb, Mashable, Profy, Search Engine Journal, SitePoint and many others. At Pamil Visions Phil is counseling clients on reputation management, corporate communications, crisis and issues management, and mergers and acquisitions.
